metadata.title: CVE-2017-9872 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.description: The III_dequantize_sample function in layer3.c in mpglib, as used inlibmpgdecoder.a in LAME 3.99.5 and other products, allows remote attackersto cause a denial of service (stack-based buffer overflow and applicationcrash) or possibly have unspecified other impact via a crafted audio file.

criterions.comment: lame package in trusty/esm is affected and needs fixing.
